text:

Title: Southwest France.
Subtitle: .
Authors: John King;Julia Wilkinson.
Categories: Travel.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=o-qTNQAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: This guide to the southwest area of France covers the Dordogne, Bordeaux and midi-Pyrenees regions, as well as Lourdes. There are sections on food and wine, chateaux and bastides, as well as a look at the championship surfing along the Atlantic coast, from Lacanau to Biarritz..
Published Year: 2002.
